about_the_game: Enhance your Hybrid Wars experience with some awesome extras. You can upgrade from the Standard Edition to Deluxe at any time, what are you waiting for? How about challenging a few contracts with a new character? Or why not take the Hybrid Wars soundtrack with you on the go while checking out the official art book packed with concept images and a character profile?
detailed_description: Enhance your Hybrid Wars experience with some awesome extras. You can upgrade from the Standard Edition to Deluxe at any time, what are you waiting for? How about challenging a few contracts with a new character? Or why not take the Hybrid Wars soundtrack with you on the go while checking out the official art book packed with concept images and a character profile?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 64-bit or newer, SteamOS
  • Processor: Core i7 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 770 or equal
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac 10.6 - 10.11 (Snow Leopard - El Capitan)
  • Processor: Core i7 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 770 or equal
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

name: Hybrid Wars Upgrade Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i3 3.2GHz or equal
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 275 or AMD Radeon HD-7770
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Core i7 or equal
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 770 or equal
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9 Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and mouse or gamepad

short_description: Enhance your Hybrid Wars experience with some awesome extras. How about challenging a few contracts with a new character? Or why not take the Hybrid Wars soundtrack with you on the go while checking out the official art book packed with concept images and a character profile?
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian*
*languages with full audio support
